EmailTemplate.name: 201909_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_MC.201909_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer Newsletter September 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
BendixKing Channel Newsletter | September 2019 Channel Updates
Sales
- Sales Bulletin 2019-BK-09 <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Sales-Bulletins]]> is available now for the MST 70B <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/mst-70b]]>. This promotion gives your customers attractive savings and another great benefit to schedule their MST 67A upgrades now.
STC’s
- KA 310 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]> – As promised, we have added more airframes to the KA 310 AML STC. The AML document can be found here <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/downloads-and-manuals]]> under AeroFlight SA04182NY. - AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]> – new software version PV.40 has been released, which expands our integration to include Aspen 1000, Aspen E5 and Garmin G5 products. Contact your Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> for specifics and questions.
TruTrak with BendixKing
- Transitioning Products – The Gemini autopilot will be transitioning over to BendixKing in the coming weeks. Vizion autopilots can be purchased now from BendixKing as the AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]> for certified aircraft and xCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xcruze-100]]> for experimental aircraft. - Downloads and Manuals – If you need a TruTrak installation manual, pilot guide, or drawings, please visit our website <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/downloads-and-manuals]]> as we have uploaded these documents. - Press release <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/honeywell-to-acquire-trutrak-flight-systems]]> on the Honeywell/BendixKing acquisition of TruTrak Flight Systems.
In case you missed it - TruTrak dealers that may have questions on the transition and onboarding; please reach out to your Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Technical & Product Support
- AeroNav products can now be registered directly <[[https://adeipmh7.pages.infusionsoft.net/]]>; you can also find this link on the AeroNav <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators]]> product page. This registers your unit with the warranty system and activates your 60-day trial for Jeppesen databases.
You can find sales bulletins posted here <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Sales-Bulletins]]> or on www.myaerospace.com <[[http://www.myaerospace.com/]]>.
Contact us <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us]]> for technical support or visit us at www.bendixking.com <[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>.
